title: Low FPS with a  gtx 1080
body: Hi ,  I've been having a lot of FPS issues with league on this new computer. I'm running a a gtx 1080 with a Ryzen  5 1600x. I have league on an SSD.  I looked at online benchmarks and it says I should get around 200 frames but I'm getting around 70 with frequent drops to  around 40. My FPS doesn't go up when I lower the graphics , I get the same FPS on ultra that I get on low.  My Graphics card usage stays below 20 and none of the cores on the cpu approach 90.  I've done a fair bit of google but I'm at a loss.

replies.body: Your rig might be too good, so you may need to cap your frame rate via in-game option to help and disable v-sync.  Definitely make sure your drivers are up to date too.  The steps in our [high specs pc](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) guide should help fix things up as well!
I have upto date drivers , and had my frame rate capped at 144.  Even when I follow the high specs pc guide and cap it at 60 , im unable to achieve a constant 60 frames.

Heya, are you on Windows 10 Fall Creator update?  If so, do you have the game on full screen? What happens if you switch to Borderless or the following steps:

Right click the League Icon on your Desktop -> Properties -> Compatibility -> Disable Fullscreen Optimization

Let me know if any of that helps.

I'm on the fall creators update but I've been on borderless the whole time. This is a screen shot of my game specs , the low fps is because i had to tab to take the screen shot but normally it hovers from 50-60. https://i.imgur.com/yr8eRYG.jpg

Gotcha, thanks for the update.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case to get some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a closer look and find some more options for ya.

I have a gtx 1080 and the same problem as your, fps are better but still not as good as it should be. Somehow borderless make my fps drop to 20, sometime the ingame fps says it display much more but moving the camera feel laggy.
